#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
#include<limits>
#include <stdio.h>
#include<set>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<queue>
#define ll long long
#define INF 999999
using namespace std;
vector <int> v[1001];
int visited[1001];
int c;
void bfs(ll i)
{
	queue <ll> q;
	q.push(i);
	visited[i]=1;
     c=1;
	while(!q.empty())
	{
		ll k=q.front();
		q.pop();
		for(ll j=0;j<v[k].size();j++)
		{
			if(visited[v[k][j]]==0)
			{
				q.push(v[k][j]);
				visited[v[k][j]]=1;
                 c++;

			}

		}
	}
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,s,f,f1,f2,res,i;
        cin>>n>>s>>f;
        res=n;
        for(i=0;i<f;++i)
        {
            cin>>f1>>f2;
            v[f1].push_back(f2);
            v[f2].push_back(f1);
        }
        bfs(s);
        res-=c;
        for(i=1;i<=n;++i)
        {
            if(v[i].size()==0)
                res-=1;
        }
        cout<<res<<'\n';
        for(i=0;i<=n;++i)
        v[i].clear();
        memset(visited,0,sizeof(visited));


    }
}
